title: IAnnotationView.IGetViewRotation
description: Gets the rotation matrix of the annotation view relative to the X-Y plane of the model.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of 9 doubles of the rotation matrix of the annotation view relative to the X-Y plane of the model VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
